SOURCES.s_procedure1: START:s_procedure1 DOCTYPE <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd"> PROPERTY this table.columns 1 PROPERTY this table.rows 1 PROPERTY this table.centered false PROPERTY this table.border 0 PROPERTY this table.width 100% PROPERTY this table.tdwidth 4% PROPERTY this table.cellpadding 0 PROPERTY this table.className newback2 PROPERTY this table.classNameie newback2 PROPERTY this td1.overflow visible PROPERTY this td1.indivheight 100% RETURN 1
SOURCES.s_procedure2:
START:s_procedure2 CALL s_procedure3 HTML
#s_Record1.TEST3.BOOK_TITLE label# #s_Record1.TEST3.BOOK_TITLE#
#s_Record1.TEST3.AUTHOR_NAME label# #s_Record1.TEST3.AUTHOR_NAME#
#s_Record1.TEST3.EDITION label# #s_Record1.TEST3.EDITION#
#s_Record1.TEST3.YEAR label# #s_Record1.TEST3.YEAR#
#s_Record1.TEST3.ISSN_ISBN label# #s_Record1.TEST3.ISSN_ISBN#
#s_Record1.TEST3.LIBRARY_ID label# #s_Record1.TEST3.LIBRARY_ID#
#s_Record1.TEST3.LOST label# #s_Record1.TEST3.LOST#
#s_Record1.TEST3.HOLD label# #s_Record1.TEST3.HOLD#
ENDHTML RETURN 1
SOURCES.s_setProperties:
START:s_setProperties
DOCTYPE <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd"> PROPERTY this table.columns 1 PROPERTY this table.rows 1 PROPERTY this table.border 0 PROPERTY this table.layout fixed PROPERTY this table.width 100% PROPERTY this table.tdwidth 4% PROPERTY this table.cellpadding 0 PROPERTY this table.className newback2 PROPERTY this table.classNameie newback2 PROPERTY this td1.overflow visible PROPERTY this td1.indivheight 100%
RETURN 1
